79b0d252-5f63-4a92-ad5d-265be6d82498.title: Pulp Fiction
79b0d252-5f63-4a92-ad5d-265be6d82498.actors: John Travolta, Uma Thurman, Samuel L. Jackson
79b0d252-5f63-4a92-ad5d-265be6d82498.plot: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

d7d8ce2e-f75d-4ad6-b68c-5629f6e17e9c.title: The Dark Knight
d7d8ce2e-f75d-4ad6-b68c-5629f6e17e9c.actors: Christian Bale, Heath Ledger, Aaron Eckhart
d7d8ce2e-f75d-4ad6-b68c-5629f6e17e9c.plot: When a menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman, James Gordon and Harvey Dent must work together to put an end to the madness.

30fec002-4eab-45b2-8b0a-fef8b385b99e.title: Black Panther
30fec002-4eab-45b2-8b0a-fef8b385b99e.actors: Chadwick Boseman, Michael B. Jordan, Lupita Nyong'o
30fec002-4eab-45b2-8b0a-fef8b385b99e.plot: T'Challa, heir to the hidden but advanced kingdom of Wakanda, must step forward to lead his people into a new future and must confront a challenger from his country's past.
